case.name: Flower power
case.description: After losing her panties, Amalia grows flowers to restore two layers.

case.name: Plant forfeit
case.description: Amalia's forfeit involves a bondage play with a giant plant.

notes.note: This case was hidden due to no longer making sense after changes were made to the targeted character. If you're rewriting this character, feel free to delete it.
